circumstances:
Shot down by enemy antiaircraft fire and crashed near Sơn La. Seven crew members were killed while two others were injured. 
Crew:
M. Monguillon, pilot,
M. Royssat, pilot,
M. Le Coz, navigator,
M. Bouissou, mechanic, 
M. Stephan, mechanic, 
M. Hoog, radio operator,
M. Lacrosse, radio operator, 
M. Carpenter, gunner, 
M. Keromnes, gunner.
probable_cause: Shot down by enemy antiaircraft fire.
